titleStmt.title: A scourge to the rebellious, or, A sermon preached at the parish Church of St. Antholin, in the city of London, June the 28th, 1685 by Steph. Willoughby ...
titleStmt.author: Willoughby, Stephen, b. 1657 or 8.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by D. Mallet, for the author,

notesStmt.note: Contains numerous errors in paging and pages bound out of order.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
